track.name: New Shoes
comments: I fell in love with this song when it was released. I was actually staring at my shoes in a waiting area the other day, smiling at them just lost in thought thinking how beautiful they were and I didn't really realise I had phased out and I looked up and there's this girl looking at me smiling and must've been thinking I was mental!
I think most women can relate to this sentiment!!
All it takes is a pair of new shoes to change your perspective.
I loved this song the first time I heard it. Back when music channels were just that :/
I used to dislike this song so much, lol. Dunno why.

Hello new shoes, bye bye blues.
http://www.flipflipmeheidi.com/article/mood-booster-new-shoes

It is so weird, I got a pair of new shoes and the world was so different. I had reason to be proud. I held my head up so high. I've outgrown them a little now but I wear them from time to time and  I keep them in my memory, I was so pruod all my friends looked at me weird but I was the baddest kid in town 'cause I put some  new shoes on and suddenly everything is right.
I love that feeling when something or someone new turns your life upside down!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=37QDVN7nEy8

Not the official video.... so much better!
He's incredible! Never written a bad song.
This song is MY BROTHERS SONG! It's so him.
music great but sorry guys he's fit
reminds me of an advert on UK TV, years ago - a Japanese girl gets on a packed train and squeals 'new shoes'! and people around her try not to step on them.  It was cute...
